plot: The mystery surrounding murders ordered by an unknown person, and a sweet-hearted woman with super strength and skills, struggling to prove she is innocent after she is accused for the crimes.
plot_en: The mystery surrounding murders ordered by an unknown person, and a sweet-hearted woman with super strength and skills, struggling to prove she is innocent after she is accused for the crimes.
plot_es: The mystery surrounding murders ordered by an unknown person, and a sweet-hearted woman with super strength and skills, struggling to prove she is innocent after she is accused for the crimes.
title: Caminhos do Coração
